body_html: Mutable built-in data structures (lists, dicts) are going to be tricky to support, since we'd need to hook mutations for restore-on-create (monkey patching?). I'm fine with supporting tuples, though, and I will add checkpointable lists and dictionaries to tf.contrib.checkpoint.
body_text: Mutable built-in data structures (lists, dicts) are going to be tricky to support, since we'd need to hook mutations for restore-on-create (monkey patching?). I'm fine with supporting tuples, though, and I will add checkpointable lists and dictionaries to tf.contrib.checkpoint.
body: Mutable built-in data structures (lists, dicts) are going to be tricky to support, since we'd need to hook mutations for restore-on-create (monkey patching?). I'm fine with supporting tuples, though, and I will add checkpointable lists and dictionaries to `tf.contrib.checkpoint`.
